tAOleU4El-Zl3Tra7.name: Code of Honor (Elven)
tAOleU4El-Zl3Tra7.notes: Never allow needless harm to trees (“coral reefs,” for sea elves) or animals, and always seek to live with elegance and style. The world should be more beautiful and full of life for your efforts.

t9Oew3smJi6NOur0c.name: Terraphobia (Ground)
t9Oew3smJi6NOur0c.notes: You are afraid of the ground, and are uncomfortable even seeing it.  If there's a chance of an actual fall from height, self-control rolls are at -5.

features.situation: to self control rolls if there is a chance of a fall from height
no penalties to Hiking or Running for going barefoot
